    FOKUS questionnaire schema

Read in voting register identifiers

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
read_voting_register_ids.Rd

Reads in the voting register identifiers of the population that was invited to participate in the FOKUS survey at the specified ballot date in the specified canton.

Usage

read_voting_register_ids(
  ballot_date = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "ballot_date", pkg = this_pkg),
  canton = cantons(ballot_date)
)

Arguments

ballot_date

FOKUS-covered ballot date. One of

  • "2018-09-23"

  • "2018-11-25"

  • "2019-10-20"

  • "2020-09-27"

  • "2020-10-18"

  • "2021-11-28"

  • "2023-06-18"

canton

FOKUS-covered canton name. One of

  • "aargau"

Value

A tibble with the column id_voting_register.

Details

Note that this data is not available for all FOKUS surveys.

See also

Other data import functions: read_easyvote_municipalities(), read_online_participation_codes(), read_private_file(), read_voting_register_data_extra()

Examples

# GitLab PAT with access to the private FOKUS repository is required for this function to work
try(
  fokus::read_voting_register_ids(ballot_date = "2019-10-20",
                                  canton = "aargau")
)
#> # A tibble: 10,000 × 1
#>    id_voting_register
#>                 <int>
#>  1             100340
#>  2             100374
#>  3             100416
#>  4             100478
#>  5             100670
#>  6             100691
#>  7             100727
#>  8             100762
#>  9             100804
#> 10             100878
#> # ℹ 9,990 more rows
